backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing enquiries in a map with auto-incrementing IDs, providing submit and query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of an unused download.webp asset with metadata and component references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining design tokens and dark mode variables for the site's color system.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point providing the root container and loading the React main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with site routes and renders the RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/ImageGalleryGrid: Responsive image grid component with dialog-based lightbox preview.
frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx: Card component displaying a project's title, location, and description.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Card component showing a service icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with company info, navigation links, contact details, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Header with branding, desktop/mobile navigation, and route-aware highlighting.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout component wrapping pages with a header, footer, and main outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor, updating on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity, handling AuthClient creation, login state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitEnquiry.ts: React Query mutation hook that submits an enquiry through an actor and invalidates the enquiries query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/validation/enquiryValid: Validates enquiry form fields with required checks, email validation, and minimum message length.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, wrapping App with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/EnquiryPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation and uses a mutation hook to submit enquiries, showing success or error states.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery page with a grid of predefined project images.
frontend/src/pages/MajorClientsPage.tsx: Shows a list of major clients and an accompanying image, styled with cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/MajorProjectsPage.tsx: Presents major completed projects and an image gallery of ongoing project photos.
frontend/src/pages/QualitySafetyPolicyPa: Renders the Quality and Safety Policy page with sections for quality, safety, and compliance using cards and an image header.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a services overview with a grid of ServiceCard components and a header image describing BM Enterprises' electrical offerings.
frontend/src/pages/TrustedElectricalCont: Implements the landing page with a hero section, company overview, highlights, and navigation buttons, plus supporting images.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme settings, color tokens, container options, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, issues, features, and architectural notes for the BM Enterprises website.
